cvrfdoc.DocumentTitle: Red Hat Enhancement Advisory: Red Hat Advanced Cluster Management for Kubernetes version 2.2 images

DocumentNotes.Note: Red Hat Advanced Cluster Management for Kubernetes 2.2.0 General Availability release

Red Hat Advanced Cluster Management for Kubernetes 2.2.0 images
Red Hat Advanced Cluster Management for Kubernetes provides the capabilities to address common challenges that administrators and site reliability engineers face as they work across a range of public and private cloud environments. Clusters and applications are all visible and managed from a single console—with security policy built in.
This advisory contains the container images for Red Hat Advanced Cluster Management for Kubernetes. See the following Release Notes documentation, which will be updated shortly for this release, for details about the enhancements in this release:
https://access.redhat.com/documentation/en-us/red_hat_advanced_cluster_mana gement_for_kubernetes/2.2/html/release_notes/
Bug fixes: * multicluster-operators-standalone-subscription pod OOMkilled due to memory usage (BZ #1867467) * RFE x509: certificate signed by unknown authority when using Git Channel with self-signed certs (BZ #1891510) * RHACM 2.2.0 images (BZ #1893876) * Configuring RBAC for limiting visibility (BZ #1896757) * IPv6 square brackets is marked invalid format in bare metal asset screen (BZ #1899147) * endpoint-observability-operator RBAC issues (BZ #1913447) * [OCP 4.6 | ACM 2.2 | BM IPI] failed to deploy MCH via operator - Cert manager container creation error (BZ# 1915503) * RHACM Observability installation failing for OCP4.5 (BZ #192496)

Notes.Note: golang-github-buger-jsonparser: infinite loop via a Delete call

Remediation.Description:
Before applying this update, make sure all previously released errata relevant to your system have been applied.
For details on how to apply this update, refer to:
https://access.redhat.com/documentation/en-us/red_hat_advanced_cluster_management_for_kubernetes/2.2/html-single/install/index#installing

Reference.Description: bz#1817733: CVE-2020-10675 golang-github-buger-jsonparser: infinite loop via a Delete call
